welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Landen, Belgium! Get ready to be charmed by our quaint city known for its beautiful countryside, rich history, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Landen has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, mainly used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal of Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal serving mainly long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
